verses.roman:
vatsareka tare āra rākhilā dhariyā
bhojana-kāle svarūpa pariveśe khasāñā

synonyms: vatsareka—one year; tare—for; āra—balance; rākhilā dhariyā—kept in stock; bhojana-kāle—at the time of lunch; svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; pariveśe—administered; khasāñā—taking out little by little.
translation: All the varieties of the remaining prasāda were kept to eat throughout the year. When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu ate His lunch, Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī would serve it little by little.
